description:
Condom Challenge - First Time In Indian | Smart Screen Productions

The “condom challenge” is a viral video that involves people -- mostly teenagers -- filling a condom with water and then dropping it on to the head of their willing victim.

When it drops, the condom breaks open to cover the head of the participant, enclosing them in a temporary latex-and-water prison.

A-White-Lie - Kannada Short Film | Smart Screen Productions

A Little Soul Films | In Association with
Smart Screen Productions     
Presents

A-White-Lie | Short Film

"It was a lazy morning for Ajay at his apartment on an optional company holiday. The invasion of privacy by his roomie’s girlfriend Sneha, keeps them engaged to have found a new friendship. However Ajay had no idea about her deliberate attempt to find a friend through a harmless lie! "

Guru - Tere Bina [Cover Song] | Abhilash Gupta | Smart Screen Productions

Our interpretation of "Tere Bina" from Guru; an evergreen melody from the formidable duo of A R Rahman and Gulzar.

Set on a Latin American groove generously sprinkled with some Bossa Nova Guitar and Vocal harmonies that surely will find a place in your heart! 

Comment, Like, Share and Subscribe because that's how we get to know you love us. Don't forget to subscribe us

description:
Jashn Ka - Sinchan Dixit ft. Abhilash Gupta | Smart Screen Productions

"Your arrival is my moment of celebration" - This is the essence of Jashn Ka. Years of yearning would come to an end; all mistakes forgotten and regrets washed away... My dream, my soul mate, my happiness is finally flourishing!!

Video Producer: Vikram Yoganand (Smart Screen Productions)
https://www.youtube.com/smartscreenpro
https://www.facebook.com/smartscreenp...
https://www.facebook.com/vikram.yoganand

Artist - Abhilash Gupta
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/abhilash.gup...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/abhiraag
Contact : gptabhilash@gmail.com

Artist - Sinchan Dixit
https://www.facebook.com/sinchandixit...

Concept, Music, Lyrics, R&B Vocals - Abhilash Gupta

Music Producer - Gokul Abhishek
Sitar - Ustad Hafiz Khan
Location Courtesy - Mr. Santosh Menon(Cliffton Park)

Lyrics:
Khwabon mein dekhithi woh Subah, Aayi
Aahon mein dhabi thi jo, Woh Chaah Chalkaayi !!

Bhool Bhulane ka Mauka,
Raahon ke Khulne ka,
Manzil se Paigham laayi !

Le aayi, Chaahat Rang laayi,
Armaan Barso ki, hai dhar pe aayi!

Dil ka kona kona mehekane laga,
Dil ki Daali Daali chehekane lage
Tere aane ka woh pal .... Jashn Ka !!

Masoom se dil ne phir naye khwaab sajaayi,
Tere aane ki raah dekhe, palke bichaayi !!

Rango se pehchaan,
Kismat se phir sulaah,
Nayi dastaan banane aayi !

Le aayi, Chaahat Rang laayi,
Armaan Barso ki, hai dhar pe aayi!

Dil ka kona kona mehekane laga,
Dil ki Daali Daali chehekane lage
Tere aane ka woh pal .... Jashn Ka !!

Baandha hai dil ne phir, tumse Ummedon ka sira, ;
Hona tu judha humse,Aas ki rakhle Laaj!!

Please click here to subscribe us:
https://www.youtube.com/smartscreenpr...

Facebook:
www.facebook.com/smartscreenproductions

Twitter:
www.Twitter.com/smartscreenpro
heading: Jashn Ka - Sinchan Dixit ft. Abhilash Gupta | Smart Screen Productions

description:
Appa My Hero - Official Teaser [2014] | Smart Screen Productions

A brief look at human behavior and the dynamics of relationships within a family. While it is an accepted belief that a parent will readily sacrifice for their child, there are moments however transient when reluctance creeps in. So, what's the right thing to do ? Moralities often determine the outcome. We present one of them. 

Please click here to subscribe us:
https://www.youtube.com/smartscreenpr...

Facebook:
www.facebook.com/smartscreenproductions

Twitter:
www.Twitter.com/smartscreenpro
heading: Appa My Hero - Official Teaser [2014] | Smart Screen Productions

description:
Dosti Mein Pyar - Abhilash Gupta | Official Music Video | Smart Screen Productions

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/vikram.yoganand
Contact : Vikram@smartscreenproductions.com

Friendship is the first stage of Love. But what if you start seeing your best friend of many years differently! "Dosti mein Pyaar" is about this exact phase when the friendship dynamics alter. 

Don't forget to Subscribe, Like & Share this video among all your friends. http://www.youtube.com/subscription_c...

Concept, Music, Lyrics, Vocals - Abhilash Gupta
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/abhilash.gup...
Twitter: https://twitter.com/abhiraag
Contact : gptabhilash@gmail.com

Video Producer: Vikram Yoganand (Smart Screen Productions)

Music Producer - Gokul Abhishek
Backing Vocals - Sheetal Raju, Sindhu Srinath, Kavya Maiya (on camera)
Mandolin - Deepak MS
Guitar (Rhythm and Bass) - Caleb Alexander
Actress - Shamantha Mukkati
Location Courtesy- Siddharth Patwa (SOUNDGLITZ)

Lyrics :
Verse 1:
Hulchul si hai, Kuch to hua hai mujhe!
Nazare Meri, Dhoondein hai har pal tujhe!

Shor mein bhi yeh; Khamoshi hai Kyun? 
Bolo na yeh Kya Hua?

Teri Meri Yaari pehle se hai,

Phir bhi Lage kyun Naya?

Tu Batha, Tu Batha.... 
Tu Batha, Tu Batha....

Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Paaya hai Shayad meine Dosti mein pyaar!

Verse 2:
Jaane tu, Mujhse bhi behathar mujhko!
Tu hai sang, jab bhi paaon akela khudko!!

Chahat ki yeh boondein, Barasi hai Aaj,
Hamare Rishten pe kyun?

Tumse mile bina, Din na lagta poora
Ab tak samjha nahi kyun?

Tu Batha, Tu Batha.... [Kyun Hua]
Tu Batha, Tu Batha.... [Kyun Hua]

Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Paaya hai Shayad meine Dosti mein pyaar!
Bridge:
Tujhko yeh mehsoos hone ka mein, Intezaar na kar sakoon|

Ghabraye Mann mera Izhaar se,
Tujhe khone ka Gham na seha sakoon...

Tu Batha, Yeh Batha, Kya Karoon mein yeh batha
Tu batha, Yeh Batha, Tu Batha......
Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Kya Yahi hai pyaar?
Paaya hai Shayad meine Dosti mein pyaar!

Please click here to subscribe us:
https://www.youtube.com/smartscreenpr...

www.facebook.com/smartscreenproductions

Twitter:
www.Twitter.com/smartscreenpro
